name: Junior Kathakar Club by Not Just Tales
description:
Every Tuesday  

Time:4 -5 PM

Age: 4-6 years

Fees: Rs 250/class

Rs 1250/6 classes

Please book the class at least 3 hours in advance for us to be able to share the login links with you. 

Learnifii is committed to help you discover and book from a wide variety of curated classes including arts, sports, STEM , dance, music, family activities and much more. We ensure the classes are of benchmarked quality from  our end.

Please note that Learnifii only refunds the booking amount in case of cancellation on part of the organiser. There is no refund in case the participant is unable to attend. For any queries/assistance, please feel free to reach out to us at +91 7464037050 or email us at support@learnifii.com
